name: SNSの投稿
text: 『例の幼なじみアイドル、干されてるらしいとか草』
trans: [looks like the childhood friend idols you mentioned before aren't getting work. hung out to dry maybe lol]

name: SNSの投稿
text: 『自業自得でしょ　アイドルなめんな』
trans: [You get what's coming to you. Being an idol isn't a joke]

name: 透
text:
じゃいっか
樋口いるし
trans:
I'm fine, then.
You're here anyway.

name: 透
trans: I'll head off after I drink this.

name: 円香
trans: ...this really is all one giant trick.

name: 円香
text: 騙されてないか、確かめに来たんです
trans: ──I wanted to make sure she wasn't being tricked into something.

name: 円香
trans: Where the hell are we going, now?

name: ダンストレーナー
text: ワン、ツー、スリー、フォー────

name: ダンストレーナー
text:
ダダダダダン！
──はい、ここまでー！

name: 小糸＆雛菜
text: ありがとうございました

name: 雛菜
text: 透先輩、今日は別メニューか～……
trans: Toru-senpai must be on a different schedule today, huh～...

name: 小糸
text:
仕方ないよ……
２年生は補講多いんだし
trans:
Not like we can do anything...
Second-years have all these supplementary classes.

name: 雛菜
text:
なんか、
前に戻ったよね～
trans:
You know,
it's like everything's back the way it was before～.

name: 雛菜
text: なんのためでもない練習になった！
trans: We just have our lessons for no reason now!

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
本番ないもんね～
trans:
Aha～
We've got nothing to prepare for～

name: 小糸
text:
そ、それは──円香ちゃん言ってたよ
もともとお仕事が来てなかったんだって……
trans: W... well, that's──Madoka-chan said, didn't she? Work wasn't really coming to us in the first place...

name: 小糸
text:
だから……
れ、練習しなきゃ……
trans:
Which was why...
W──we need to practice...

name: プロデューサー
text:
いえ……大丈夫です……！
業界に慣れていないところはあるんですが──
trans: No... that'd be perfectly fine...! There are certainly ways about the industry that they're not quite familiar with yet, but──

name: プロデューサー
text:
──あぁ……ははは……
あれ、ご覧になられてましたか……
trans: ──Ahh... hahaha... Er, I suppose you might've seen for yourself, then...

name: プロデューサー
text:
その、純粋さゆえといいますか……
ああいったことは今後はございませんので……
trans: Well, in accounting for the purity of their actions... suffice to say, there should be no such trouble of the sort in future, so...

name: プロデューサー
text:
……えっ、いえ
そうした露出はウチはちょっと……！
trans: ...er, no, sorry, that level of exposure would be a little much for our...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
────はぁ……
『純粋なのと素人とは違う』……か
trans:
──Haahh...
"A pure approach and an amateur approach are distinct things"... huh?

name: プロデューサー
text:
────ふぅ
騒動のことは弁解の余地もない……けど
trans:
──Phew.
We're not excusing ourselves any time soon for that rebellion, for sure... but.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……
なんて言えばいいんだろうな……
trans:
...
How do you put it across, exactly...

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああいう……
輝きのこと

name: プロデューサー
text:
あの本番が、
輝いてたって感じる気持ちのこと────
trans: The way they shone on that program itself. The way in which you could feel they gleamed bright──

name: 円香
text:
……終わった
小糸は、自主練？
trans:
...They finished.
Doing your own training, Koito?

name: 円香
text: どっちかっていうと気分転換だけど
trans: Just needed a change of pace more than anything, really.

name: 円香
text: 体力があって悪いことはないし
trans: And no-one ever said getting into shape was a bad thing.

name: 小糸
text:
円香ちゃん、全然……
歌えて踊れるのに
trans: Even so, Madoka-chan, you're... still doing totally fine, singing and dancing.

name: 円香
text:
……小糸もでしょ
全然、歌えて踊れてる
trans: ...You too, Koito. Singing and dancing. You're doing totally fine.

name: 円香
text:
……なんのために練習してるのか
とか、思ったりしないの
trans: ...Have you thought about what the point of all this training even is?

name: 小糸
text:
……雛菜ちゃんも、
『なんのためでもない練習に戻った』って
trans:
...Hinana-chan was saying too.
"We've gone back to having lessons for no reason now".

name: 円香
trans: "All while being given the cold shoulder"?

name: 小糸
text:
そ、それは──
円香ちゃん、そうじゃないって……
trans:
I mean, that's──
Madoka-chan, that's not what it is...

name: 円香
text:
うん。まだスタートラインに立ってないでしょ
干される前に、知られてないから
trans: Mm. We didn't even get to the starting line. Nobody even knew us before we got everyone's cold shoulder.

name: 円香
text:
──
あの時映ってたのが、ちゃんと浅倉だったらって
trans:
──
About that time, actually. I'm thinking, if they'd gotten their focus on Asakura.

name: 円香
text: 思ってるんだったら、大間違い
trans: Like they'd planned it. It would've been their biggest mistake.

name: 円香
text:
あいつ、３回に１回くらい
歌詞ごまかしてるから
trans: Because she completely goldfishes the lyrics a third of the time.

name: 円香
text:
ほんと
やたら堂々としてるから、気付かれないけど
trans:
Yep.
She struts around being her thoughtless majestic self, so you don't really notice.

name: 小糸
text:
ぜ、全然気付かなかった……！
円香ちゃん、すごいね……
trans:
I... I didn't notice at all...!
Madoka-chan, you're incredible...

name: 円香
text:
いちばん『仕事』していたのは小糸
──小糸がカメラに映ってくれてよかったの
trans: The one doing the most "work" there was you, Koito. Honestly, I'm thankful they put the cameras on you.

name: 円香
text:
ひとりでずっと練習してたの
知ってる
trans: Training on your own all this time, I know.

name: 円香
text:
……知られたくないのかも
っては思ってたけど
trans: ...though I get that was something you didn't really want to be known.

name: 小糸
text:
──わたし、
やっとみんなといれるようになったって
trans: ──I'd finally... managed to belong with all of you.

name: 透
text:
あるよ
このさきに、海

name: 小糸
text:
わ、わたし……
絶対、絶対一緒に行くから……！
trans:
I──I'll...
Absolutely, definitely go with you all...!

name: 円香
text:
そんなこと、
心配しなくてもいいのに
trans: Though, really, you'd be fine not concerning yourself with all that.

name: 小糸
text:
よ、よくないよ……！
みんな、すごいもん！
trans:
It──it wouldn't be fine...!
You're all so incredible, is the thing!

name: 円香
text: でも、私もほんとは心配なのかも
trans: But maybe at the end of it all, I'm just as concerned as you.

name: 円香
text:
どんどん走っていって……
危なっかしいから
trans: Just going, running on and on, never stopping to look back... it's so nervewracking. So touch-and-go.

name: 円香
trans: And it hurts just to watch.

name: 小糸
text:
じゃあ、
やっぱり練習しよう……！

name: 小糸
text:
不安が、ちょっとの間だけ
どこかにいくから……
trans: If you have any worries──they'll go off somewhere in an instant...

name: 円香
text: じゃ、フォローするから
trans: Then I'll follow what you do.

name: 円香
trans: Where are you heading off to?
